TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from the masters of culinary arts who use our app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my kitchen! The recipe suggestions and step-by-step guides make cooking complex dishes a breeze.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a busy mom, this app is a lifesaver. I can quickly plan nutritious meals for my family with just a few taps.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The ingredient substitution feature is genius! It helps me cater to different dietary needs without sacrificing flavor.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our recipe app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What kind of recipes does the app offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app has a vast collection of recipes spanning different cuisines, dietary preferences, and skill levels. From quick weeknight meals to elaborate feasts, you'll find something for every occasion.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I save my favorite recipes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Absolutely! You can create a personalized recipe box and save recipes you love for easy access later. The app also lets you add notes and modifications to the saved recipes.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Does the app provide nutritional information?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, each recipe includes a detailed nutritional breakdown, making it easier to track your dietary intake if needed.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I scale recipes for different serving sizes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, our app has a handy portion calculator that adjusts ingredient quantities based on the number of servings you need.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a way to meal plan with the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! Our app includes a meal planning feature that lets you plan out meals for the week or month. You can drag and drop recipes to create a custom meal plan.

STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Unleash your inner chef with FoodCraft. Easy recipes, grocery lists, and cooking tips - all in one delicious app.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Easily create and customize recipes with our user-friendly interface. Add ingredients, instructions, and photos with a few clicks.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Access a comprehensive database of ingredients from around the world, complete with nutritional information and substitution suggestions.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Plan your meals in advance with our intelligent meal planner. Get recipe suggestions based on dietary preferences, schedule, and pantry inventory.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Follow along with detailed, step-by-step instructions and photos to ensure your dishes turn out perfectly every time.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Automatically generate a shopping list based on your chosen recipes, making grocery trips a breeze.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Connect with fellow food enthusiasts, share your creations, and discover new recipes from a vibrant community of home cooks.
CTA_BODY: Elevate your culinary skills with our intuitive app for creating mouthwatering dishes. Explore diverse recipes, master new techniques, and unlock a world of flavor.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Cooking App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What types of recipes does the app include?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app features a vast collection of recipes spanning various cuisines and dietary preferences. Whether you're looking for quick weeknight meals, gourmet dishes, vegetarian/vegan options, or recipes tailored to specific diets, you'll find something to suit your tastes.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How easy is it to follow the recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We've designed the app to make cooking a breeze. Each recipe includes clear, step-by-step instructions accompanied by helpful photos or videos. Ingredients are listed in a user-friendly format, making it easy to plan your grocery shopping.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I save my favorite recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! Our app allows you to create a personalized recipe box where you can save and organize your favorite recipes for quick access. You can also add notes and modifications to each recipe, ensuring you can recreate your favorite dishes exactly how you like them.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app suitable for beginners?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our app is designed to be user-friendly for both seasoned cooks and beginners alike. We provide helpful cooking tips, technique guides, and a glossary of culinary terms to assist those new to cooking. With our easy-to-follow recipes, anyone can learn to make delicious meals.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Discover thousands of recipes from around the world, with new ideas added daily to keep your culinary journey fresh and exciting.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Our detailed instructions with photos and videos ensure you can recreate each dish with confidence, no matter your skill level.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Tailor your meal plans to suit your dietary needs and preferences, making it easier than ever to eat delicious, healthy meals.
